title: Nerd Week: Andy Benoit on Bucs use of Tom Brady, hope for Falcons offense (Football 8/21)
description:
Nerd Week wraps up as friend of the podcast Andy Benoit joins Will Brinson to break down a couple of NFC South teams and an old NFC South quarterback. First, the guys explore the Falcons offense and if Todd Gurley can ever be a star again. Then, a look at Tom Brady and how he fits within Bruce Arians' scheme in Tampa. Finally, Will and Andy address how the Patriots quarterbacks have reportedly looked at practice this week and Cam Newton's advantage.
'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox and wherever else you listen to podcasts. 
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod, @willbrinson, @Andy_Benoit
Visit the Pick Six YouTube channel: https://www.youtube.com/picksix

First, the guys explore the Falcons offense and if Todd Gurley can ever be a star again. Then, a look at Tom Brady and how he fits within Bruce Arians' scheme in Tampa. Finally, Will and Andy address how the Patriots quarterbacks have reportedly looked at practice this week and Cam Newton's advantage.
